```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(janitor)
library(here)
library(quanteda)
library(quanteda.sentiment)
library(quanteda.textstats)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(lubridate)
library(wordcloud) 
library(reshape2)
```

```{r}
data <- readRDS(here("data", "ipcc_tweets.RDS"))

tweets <- data %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(title, date) %>% 
  rename(text = title) %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(date,'%m/%d/%y'),
         id = seq_along(title),
         text = tolower(text))

# URLs
tweets$text <- gsub("(http\\S+\\s*)|(www\\S+\\s*)", "", tweets$text)
# Twitter accounts
tweets$text <- gsub("@\\S+\\s*", "", tweets$text)
# Numbers and punctuation
tweets$text <- gsub("[[:digit:][:punct:]]", "", tweets$text)

```
